query.statement:
SELECT Z.WBS ,Z.MATKL ,Z.DZEINR ,Z.MATNR -- 자재번호 ,Z.ITEM ,Z.SPEC12 ,Z.SPEC3 ,Z.SPEC5 ,Z.ECSF ,Z.ETM ,Z.WBSNM ,Z.ZSPEC1 ,Z.ZSPEC2 ,Z.MAKTX ,Z.QNTY ,Z.UNIT ,CASE WHEN Z.WAERK IN ('KRW', 'JPY') AND Z.GBN = 'A' THEN Z.SVAMT * Z.QNTY ELSE Z.SVAMT END AS SVAMT , Z.DEPT, Z.GJAHR, Z.ITEMNM, Z.CTEXT1 AS DEPT_NM, Z.GBN FROM ( SELECT A.WOKNUM AS WBS ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.DZEINR AS DZEINR ,A.IDNRK AS MATNR -- 자재번호 ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,VALUE(A.SPEC12, '') AS SPEC12 ,VALUE(A.SPEC3, 0) AS SPEC3 ,VALUE(A.SPEC5, 0) AS SPEC5 ,VALUE(A.ECSF, '') AS ECSF ,VALUE(A.ETM, '') AS ETM ,B.POST1 AS WBSNM ,D.ZSPEC1 AS ZSPEC1 ,D.ZSPEC2 AS ZSPEC2 ,C.MAKTX AS MAKTX ,SUM(A.QNTY) AS QNTY ,MAX(A.UNIT) AS UNIT , A.WAERK ,CASE WHEN A.WAERK IN ('KRW', 'JPY') THEN A.SVAMT * 100 ELSE A.SVAMT END AS SVAMT , A.DEPT, A.GJAHR, E.ITEMNM, F.CTEXT1, A.GBN
FROM (
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.WOKNUM AS WOKNUM ,A.IDNRK AS IDNRK ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.DZEINR AS DZEINR ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,A.ITEM AS ITEM ,B.SPEC12 AS SPEC12 ,B.SPEC3 AS SPEC3 ,B.SPEC5 AS SPEC5 ,C.VALUE AS ECSF ,D.VALUE AS ETM ,A.QNTY ,A.UNIT , A.WAERK , A.SVAMT , A.DEPT, A.GJAHR, A.GBN FROM
( SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT ,A.WOKNUM AS WOKNUM ,A.IDNRK AS IDNRK ,A.MATKL AS MATKL ,A.DZEINR AS DZEINR ,A.MATNR AS MATNR ,AA.ITEM AS ITEM ,VALUE(A.MENGE, 0) AS QNTY ,A.MEINS AS UNIT , AA.WAERK , AA.SVAMT , AA.DEPT, AA.GJAHR, 'A' AS GBN
FROM ( SELECT C.MANDT, C.IDNRK AS IDNRK, C.IDNRK AS MATNR, C.WOKNUM, C.MATKL, C.DZEINR, C.MEINS ,CASE C.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN C.MENGE WHEN '02' THEN (SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.MENGE END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS C WHERE C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.IDNRK IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 WHERE B1.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B1.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND B1.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 자재 AND B1.DEPT||B1.GJAHR||B1.ITEM IN ( SELECT Z.DEPT||Z.GJAHR||Z.ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT076 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B1.MANDT AND Z.DEPT = B1.DEPT AND Z.GJAHR = B1.GJAHR AND Z.ITEM = B1.ITEM AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM# AND Z.SGBN = 'S' ) ) AND C.CRDAT BETWEEN #S_CRDAT# AND #E_CRDAT# AND (C.PRCTYP IN ('A','N') OR (C.PRCTYP = 'C' AND C.CTYP IN ('Q','B')))
AND C.WOKNUM = #WBS#
UNION ALL
SELECT C.MANDT, C.IDNRK AS IDNRK, C.IDNRK AS MATNR, C.WOKNUM, C.MATKL, C.DZEINR, C.MEINS ,CASE C.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN (CASE C.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN C.MENGE * 0 WHEN 'C' THEN C.OLD_QUAN * 0 END) WHEN '02' THEN (CASE C.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.MENGE) * 0) WHEN 'C' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.OLD_QUAN) * 0) END) END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS C WHERE C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.IDNRK IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 WHERE B1.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B1.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND B1.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 자재 AND B1.DEPT||B1.GJAHR||B1.ITEM IN ( SELECT Z.DEPT||Z.GJAHR||Z.ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT076 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B1.MANDT AND Z.DEPT = B1.DEPT AND Z.GJAHR = B1.GJAHR AND Z.ITEM = B1.ITEM AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM# AND Z.SGBN = 'S' ) ) AND C.CRDAT BETWEEN #S_CRDAT# AND #E_CRDAT# AND (C.PRCTYP = 'D' OR (C.PRCTYP = 'C' AND C.CTYP IN ('Q','B')))
AND C.WOKNUM = #WBS#
-- 도면번호 정보 UNION ALL
SELECT C.MANDT, C.IDNRK AS IDNRK, C.DZEINR AS MATNR, C.WOKNUM, C.MATKL, C.DZEINR, C.MEINS ,CASE C.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN C.MENGE WHEN '02' THEN (SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.MENGE END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS C WHERE C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.DZEINR IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 WHERE B1.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B1.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND B1.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND B1.GUBUN = '2' -- 도면 AND B1.DEPT||B1.GJAHR||B1.ITEM IN ( SELECT Z.DEPT||Z.GJAHR||Z.ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT076 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B1.MANDT AND Z.DEPT = B1.DEPT AND Z.GJAHR = B1.GJAHR AND Z.ITEM = B1.ITEM AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM# AND Z.SGBN = 'S' ) ) AND C.CRDAT BETWEEN #S_CRDAT# AND #E_CRDAT# AND (C.PRCTYP IN ('A','N') OR (C.PRCTYP = 'C' AND C.CTYP IN ('Q','B')))
AND C.WOKNUM = #WBS#
UNION ALL
SELECT C.MANDT, C.IDNRK AS IDNRK, C.DZEINR AS MATNR, C.WOKNUM, C.MATKL, C.DZEINR, C.MEINS ,CASE C.BOM_LEVEL WHEN '01' THEN (CASE C.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN C.MENGE * 0 WHEN 'C' THEN C.OLD_QUAN * 0 END) WHEN '02' THEN (CASE C.PRCTYP WHEN 'D' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.MENGE) * 0) WHEN 'C' THEN (((SELECT MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = C.MANDT AND WOKNUM = C.WOKNUM AND IDNRK = C.MATNR AND CRDAT <= #E_CRDAT# ORDER BY CRDAT DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY ) * C.OLD_QUAN) * 0) END) END AS MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS C WHERE C.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND C.DZEINR IN (SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 WHERE B1.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B1.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND B1.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND B1.GUBUN = '2' -- 도면 AND B1.DEPT||B1.GJAHR||B1.ITEM IN ( SELECT Z.DEPT||Z.GJAHR||Z.ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT076 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B1.MANDT AND Z.DEPT = B1.DEPT AND Z.GJAHR = B1.GJAHR AND Z.ITEM = B1.ITEM AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM# AND Z.SGBN = 'S' ) ) AND C.CRDAT BETWEEN #S_CRDAT# AND #E_CRDAT# AND (C.PRCTYP = 'D' OR (C.PRCTYP = 'C' AND C.CTYP IN ('Q','B')))
AND C.WOKNUM = #WBS#
-------보수자재 UNION ALL
SELECT B.MANDT, B.MATNR AS IDNRK, B.MATNR, B.AFNAM as WOKNUM, C.BLOCK_NO as MATKL, C.DZEINR, C.MEINS, B.MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ekko AS a INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ekpo AS b ON b.ebeln = a.ebeln and b.mandt = a.mandt INNER JOIN SAPHEE.mara AS c ON c.matnr = b.matnr and c.mandt = b.mandt WHERE a.mandt = #G_MANDT# and a.bedat BETWEEN #S_CRDAT# AND #E_CRDAT# --" 발주일 AND b.werks = '2000' -- " 보수플랜트 AND b.knttp in ('' , 'F') -- " STOCK발주만 조회 AND b.loekz = '' AND b.matnr IN ( SELECT B1.MATNR FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT073 B1 WHERE B1.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND B1.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND B1.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND B1.GUBUN = '1' -- 도면 AND B1.DEPT||B1.GJAHR||B1.ITEM IN ( SELECT Z.DEPT||Z.GJAHR||Z.ITEM FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT076 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B1.MANDT AND Z.DEPT = B1.DEPT AND Z.GJAHR = B1.GJAHR AND Z.ITEM = B1.ITEM AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM# AND Z.SGBN = 'S' ) )
AND B.AFNAM = #WBS#
) AS A
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT073 AS AA ON AA.MANDT = A.MANDT
AND AA.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND AA.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND AA.MATNR = A.MATNR
UNION ALL
SELECT Z.MANDT , Z.WBS AS WOKNUM , Z.MATNR AS IDNRK , Z.MATKL , '' AS DZEINR , Z.MATNR , Z.ITEM , Z.QNTY , Z.UNIT , Z.WAERK , Z.SVAMT , Z.DEPT , Z.GJAHR , 'B' AS GBN FROM SAPHEE.ZQMT078 AS Z WHERE Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
AND Z.DEPT = #DEPT#
AND Z.GJAHR = #GJAHR#
AND Z.RSLTYM = #RSLTYM#
AND Z.WBS = #WBS#
) AS A -- 상세조건 추가부분 (SPEC, 인승, 속도) LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE( SELECT MANDT, POSID_1, CASE WHEN ZSPEC12 IN (' ', '') THEN '' ELSE ZSPEC12 END AS SPEC12, CAST(CASE WHEN ZSPEC3 IN (' ', '') THEN '0' ELSE ZSPEC3 END AS INT) AS SPEC3, CAST(CASE ZSPEC5 WHEN ' ' THEN '0' WHEN '17L' THEN '17' WHEN '13M' THEN '13' WHEN '' THEN '0' ELSE ZSPEC5 END AS INT) AS SPEC5 FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# ) AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = B.POSID_1
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S2.MANDT, S2.HOGI, S2.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S2.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S2 WHERE S2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S2.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S2.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ECSF' GROUP BY S2.MANDT, S2.HOGI, S2.CHARACTERISTIC) AS S2 ON A.MANDT = S2.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = S2.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S1.MANDT, S1.HOGI, S1.VALUE, S1.CHARACTERISTIC, S1.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S1 WHERE S1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S1.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ECSF' AND S1.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS C ON C.MANDT = S2.MANDT AND C.HOGI = S2.HOGI AND C.CHARACTERISTIC = S2.CHARACTERISTIC AND C.SEQ = S2.SEQ
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S2.MANDT, S2.HOGI, S2.CHARACTERISTIC, MAX(S2.SEQ) AS SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S2 WHERE S2.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S2.HOGI = A.WOKNUM AND S2.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ETM' GROUP BY S2.MANDT, S2.HOGI, S2.CHARACTERISTIC) AS SS2 ON A.MANDT = SS2.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = SS2.HOGI
LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE (SELECT S1.MANDT, S1.HOGI, S1.VALUE, S1.CHARACTERISTIC, S1.SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 AS S1 WHERE S1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND S1.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ETM' AND S1.HOGI = A.WOKNUM ) AS D ON D.MANDT = SS2.MANDT AND D.HOGI = SS2.HOGI AND D.CHARACTERISTIC = SS2.CHARACTERISTIC AND D.SEQ = SS2.SEQ
WHERE 1 = 1
) AS A
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.PRPS AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND SUBSTR(A.WOKNUM,1,6) = B.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.MAKT AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.IDNRK = C.MATNR AND C.SPRAS = '3' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.WOKNUM = D.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT071 AS E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.DEPT = E.DEPT AND A.GJAHR = E.GJAHR AND A.ITEM = E.ITEM LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.DEPT = F.CODE2 AND F.LANG = 'ko' AND F.CODE1 = 'QM01'
WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL, A.DZEINR, A.IDNRK, A.ITEM, A.SPEC12, A.SPEC3, A.SPEC5, A.ECSF, A.ETM, B.POST1, D.ZSPEC1, D.ZSPEC2, C.MAKTX,A.WAERK , A.SVAMT, A.DEPT, A.GJAHR, E.ITEMNM, F.CTEXT1, A.GBN ORDER BY A.ITEM, A.IDNRK, A.WOKNUM, A.MATKL
) AS Z ORDER BY Z.ITEM, Z.WBS WITH UR
